name: Athletic Stadium Reconstruction Website
description: This website is dedicated on the reconstruction of the athletic stadium at Marlboro Highschool. The website has many features including a timelapse of the actualy reconstruction project.

name: Marlboro Tech Ed Website
description: This website explains everything you need to know about the B-wing in Marlboro High School, including rooms, classes, and teachers that are apart of it

name: Trunk or Treat Website
description: This website showcases Marlboro High School's annual trunk or treat event, including event details and pictures from past events.

name: Stevens Recruitment Website
description: This recruitment website showcased why Stevens is a good choice for a school, including popular majors and extra curricular activities.

name: Little Bird Toy Company Website
description: This website was for a simulated client that has a wooden toy shop, focussing on the products that a customer can buy, as well as a contact form.

name: On My Birthday Website
description: This website focused on practicing javscript skills. Specifically, altering HTML elements based on what event was showcased.
